articles.title: Tripti Dimri: Playing Bulbbul helped me start loving myself a little more - The Indian Express
articles.description: Anvita Dutt directorial Bulbbul will reunite Tripti Dimri with her Laila Majnu co-star Avinash Tiwary. Also starring Rahul Bose, Parambrata Chattopadhyay and Paoli Dam, the film will start streaming on Netflix from June 24.
